Bandelier’s mesas and canyons have human history that dates back more than 10,000 years. The ancestral sites in Bandelier continue to hold deep cultural and religious significance to the pueblos.

Only Congress can create a national park and provide the highest level of protection for cultural resources.
 
It's long past time that we recognize that Bandelier’s historical and natural resources are more than worthy of the protections national park status has to offer.

That’s why I am so proud to introduce legislation today to make Bandelier our nation’s newest national park.
